name: DunG03ns
description:
CONTROLS : Z is A button, X is B button, Arrows to move

Playable on devices with touchscreen

Made in GBStudio - THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS ! IT STILL HAS BUGS AND VERY FEW RANDOM EVENTS. FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER IF YOU WANT UPDATES ON IT.

DunG03ns is a choose your own adventure point and click GameBoy game about nightmares, anxiety, daily life and dysphoria (yeah that's a big one). Live your day, survive your nights, do your dishes, fight monsters, take a shower, run for your life.

  • Play on GameBoy, GameBoy Advance, PC, your phone, a hacked psvita, your connected dishwasher
  • Experience the amazing soundtrack written by Louis Raynaud in your crunchy little earbuds
  • Cool pixel art monsters that will spook you or hug you
  • Try not cracking your egg by wandering a trans girl's flat and thoughts (very hard)

------------------

This project is very personal and is supposed to represent how I felt in my early transition, during quarantine. It was conceived as a end-of-year school project at Gobelins. I'm forever grateful to the friends that pushed me through and encouraged me even when I felt this wasn't worth at all. And thanks Louis for accepting to make the amazing soundtrack despite your schedule and difficulties with the tracker. I love you all.
